extendedInfo.description: Jade Monkey 3D FREE!!This app is designed for both android and Android tablet devices!!First and foremost, thank you very much for all the feedback. We worked very hard to implement your great suggestions  : )Below is a list of all the new features:***Multiplayer -Cross Platform - You can play anyone from any device [Android, iOS, Blackberry, Flash, Unity, PC and Mac]******Challenge your friends******Real time head to head gameplay******All New Art, and Levels***Venture into the mysterious rainforest in the hunt for colorful gems and shiny gold coins. Alas you have uncovered the hidden temple of the Jade Monkey! Swap jewels vertically or horizontally to form groups of three or more same-color. Form multiple matches in a row quickly to appease the gods and unlock time bonuses. Stone glyphs suggest that the temple contains magical treasures, elemental powers, and match-making adventures - but beware the deadly magic guarding the Temple Treasure. Dare to brave our popular new match-three game.Features:* Real time multiplayer action** Classic match-three style puzzle solving** Unique time bonus multiplier** Cool sound and special effects** Unlock Magical Jewels and Wards* * Android 2.0 and above*This app is designed for both Android and Android tablet devices!!

reviews.title: Boring same game!
reviews.comment: I hate games that won\'t let me exit and this is one of them. No different to hundreds of other games in its play.
reviews.author: Angie Dominic

reviews.title: Not as good as iPhone app
reviews.comment: I had it on my iPhone before I broke it & was more addicted to this than angry birds but now the sound/visual quality is terrible. I guess 3d I\'d not for me
reviews.author: Bree Williams

reviews.title: Smsfans
reviews.comment: The game itself has proven itself as entertaining. BUT people, please! The sound is like listening underwater, soooo horrible sound quality i maybe had in my cassete recorder. I couldnt play it because of thay hirrible sound even though i love the game and would pay those 99 cents.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstalling!!!
reviews.comment: Can\'t even enjoy! Right when I get into it then it freezes!!:( Awful!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very addicted game!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!!!
reviews.comment: Update  seems to fix the previous issues.  quickmatch multiplayer is fun. Sounds are HD again been waiting for this. Great free game!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: You replaced a fun game with this? Graphics better in old version you could actually see tiles better. Hate this version. Have to turn tab upside down
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wth
reviews.comment: Initial reaction: why the hell is the game upside-down!? Second reaction: okay, this seems fun. Third reaction: I have no idea what I am doing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: This game was pretty good, but the update is just awful. Nearly every aspect of the game is worse than it was before. Graphics & gameplay bad now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: \"Directly call\" permission removed, but does not install properly and cannot be run.
